techmeme.title: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman, Uber CEO Dara Khosrowshahi, and, a source says, Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg are planning to attend Trump's inauguration events this month (Bloomberg)
Apple opposes a shareholder measure calling for an end to DEI efforts, saying the proposal was an inappropriate attempt to restrict Apple's business operations (Mark Gurman/Bloomberg)
Zuckerberg says Meta's fact-checking was "something out of 1984" and criticized the media for hounding Facebook to clamp down on misinfo after the 2016 election (Angrej Singh/Axios)
Sources: OpenAI, Google, and other companies are collectively paying hundreds of content creators for access to their unpublished videos to train AI models (Aisha Counts/Bloomberg)
Zuckerberg slams Apple, saying it hasn't "really invented anything great in a while", he's "optimistic" that Apple will "get beat by someone" soon, and more (Chance Miller/9to5Mac)
